# normalizeAmount() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function normalizeAmount(
  contractWrapper: ContractWrapper<BaseERC20>,
  amount: Amount,
): Promise<BigNumber>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter       | Type                             | Description |
| --------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| contractWrapper | ContractWrapper&lt;BaseERC20&gt; |             |
| amount          | [Amount](./sdk.amount.md)        |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt;
